execution.shell:
#!/bin/bash
set +x
set +e 
export INIT_START_TIME=$(date +"%s")

export TEST_CMD=#TEST_CMD#        
        
. $EXT_DIR/_init.sh
INIT_END_TIME=$(date +"%s")
INIT_EST_TIME=$(($INIT_END_TIME-$INIT_START_TIME))
echo -e "Init runtime of `date -u -d @"$INIT_EST_TIME" +'%-Mm %-Ss'`"
        
/bin/sh ${EXT_DIR}/execute.sh    
RESULT=$?
    
if [ $RESULT -ne 0 ]; then
    exit 1
fi
